Subject: Error Scanning Windows FileShare with Least Privileged permission
Description:
Getting the following error when attempting to scan Windows hosts:
error enumerating remote shares: access is denied

Validated the following permissions on Target Host:
Scanning Local Mode
Backup Operators and Power Users 
Back up Files and Directories Local Security Policy (inherited from Backup Operators)
Solution_Comment__c:
We resolved the issue by changing group membership permissions to Access Control Assistance Operators to reflect the updated LPA recommendations for WinServer 2022 and later.
